MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry affecting properties in Trefonen, Nantmawr and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 8:48am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:48am on 17th November 2020.
